item.title: Notes about Prometheus & Grafana
item.description: Installation> Installation # Prometheus & the related components (eg: pushgateway, blackbox_exporter, alertmanager) - scrape engine - it’s better to look at the README.md and Dockerfile on their github repo to get the information about the docker setup
